resources.string: The Giza Zoo is a zoological garden in Giza. It is one of the few green areas in the city, and includes Giza\'s largest park
a wide variety of herbivores exist in Giza Zoo with some of them having open cages for visitors.
a wide variety of predators exist in Giza Zoo, locked inside strong cages for safety.
you can take beautiful photographs with the animals for a cheap price.
There are dozens of cafe shops if you want to take a rest before continuing your journey.
The Cairo Tower is a free-standing concrete tower located in Cairo At 187 m (614 ft),One of Cairo\'s well-known modern monuments
Witness the most beautiful view of Cairo from above!
As you go up the tower, there are dozens of cafe shops and restaurants where you can stop and enjoy a good meal
The Museum of Egyptian Antiquities, is home to an extensive collection of ancient Egyptian antiquities. It has 120,000 items
Witness the greatness of pharaohs!, see Mummified bodies made thousands of years ago.
thousands of statues of old egyptians, made of perfection!
The Giza Pyramids, built to endure an eternity, the monumental tombs are relics of Egypt\'s Old Kingdom era.
